I have seen many Kagglers facing loading dataset problem. There are many solutions to solve it as many other have proposed. Also, most programmers prefer to work with Pandas even though some other similar and faster libraries are presented for this purpose.

**1) Load Data
**
As the first step be patient and let the dataframe to be loaded that it might take a few minutes.
